GoogleDrive

Allow downloading of sharable files using their link

download(self, link, destination=None, dumpHeader=False, download=True)[source]¶
Link

shared link of file from google drive

Destination

file name if you want over ride the original OR zipped files

DumpHeader

debug, print response info

Download

debug, do everything but actually download file

Return: (bool, filename)
